## Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Use Case

Describe the problem this feature would solve or the use case it addresses.

**Example**: "As a user with multiple keyboards, I want to quickly switch between saved profiles so that I can use different configurations for gaming vs. typing."

## Proposed Solution

Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered any alternative solutions or workarounds?

## Additional Context

- Screenshots, mockups, or diagrams (if applicable)
- Links to similar features in other applications
- Any technical considerations

## Checklist

- [ ] I have searched existing issues to ensure this feature hasn't been requested
- [ ] I have provided a clear use case for this feature
- [ ] I have considered how this fits with AureTrix's existing functionality
